input_email_body:
Subject: Support Inquiry for Network Access

I am encountering difficulties in accessing medical data owing to a network disruption My name is Carlos Mendoza.. Despite efforts to reset the router, perform virus scans, and review firewall configurations, the issue remains unresolved. I believe there might be a configuration mistake or a potential malware intrusion. Could you offer assistance in addressing this concern? You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.
